page.title: 17 Recreation in Keith
page.content: The most popular sport is football. Keith Football Club play at the Kynoch Park ground in Balloch Road.Keith F.C. play in the Highland League which they won in 1985.There is also a Junior League team called Islavale.Many people play football for fun in their spare time. Keith also has a Cricket Club.Two teams play in the North Leagues during the summer months.Other sports clubs in Keith include squash,golf and bowls.The Bowling Club is in Church Road.In summer,the game is played outdoors but in winter when the weather is bad, indoor rinks are used.A small bore rifle club meets at the indoor rifle range in Moss Street. There are two shops which sell sports equipment and clothing.The Gun Exchange sells shooting and fishing gear. The Centre Spot sells general sports goods.
